titleStmt.title: A serious examination of a pretended answer to a paper of judgment past at Yorke with a reply thereto : wherein several of the mistakes and errors in the said answer are manifested and detected and the proceedings of Friends against J.C., E.N., T.D., and JW., and their abettors are vindicated and cleared / by George Myers.
titleStmt.author: Myers, George, 1653?-1714.
